name: Admin removes himself from project via CLI
description:
- Login with valid credentials via **UI**.
- Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Login with Bearer auth token via **CLI**.
- Create new project via **CLI**.

### Verify that:

- `Admin` **cannot** remove himself from project via **CLI**.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials via UI.
  • Get Bearer auth token from Playwright local storage.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Login with Bearer auth token via CLI.
  • Create new project via CLI.

Verify that:

  • Admin cannot remove himself from project via CLI.
statusMessage:
AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Remove user from project via CLI
Message:  Expected: ERROR: Illegal argument(s) (Last project admin cannot be removed), got: Your root certificates are out of date.
You are using certifi 2025.7.14, however 2025.8.3 is available.
Please consider upgrading certifi package, e.g.:
    python -m pip install --upgrade certifi
or
    conda update certifi

ERROR: Illegal argument(s) (Last project admin cannot be removed)
statusTrace:
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:49: in wrapper
    result = await func(*args, **kwargs)
             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
tests/test_cases/steps/cli_steps/comonent_steps_impl/admin_steps.py:151: in cli_remove_user_from_proj
    assert error_message == expected_error, (
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
E   AssertionError:  Expected: ERROR: Illegal argument(s) (Last project admin cannot be removed), got: Your root certificates are out of date.
E   You are using certifi 2025.7.14, however 2025.8.3 is available.
E   Please consider upgrading certifi package, e.g.:
E       python -m pip install --upgrade certifi
E   or
E       conda update certifi
E   
E   ERROR: Illegal argument(s) (Last project admin cannot be removed)

The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:
tests/test_cases/tests_cli/test_project_remove_members.py:306: in test_admin_remove_himself_from_proj_cli
    await self._cli_steps.admin.cli_remove_user_from_proj(
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:58: in wrapper
    raise AssertionError(formatted_msg) from e
E   AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: Remove user from project via CLI
E   Message:  Expected: ERROR: Illegal argument(s) (Last project admin cannot be removed), got: Your root certificates are out of date.
E   You are using certifi 2025.7.14, however 2025.8.3 is available.
E   Please consider upgrading certifi package, e.g.:
E       python -m pip install --upgrade certifi
E   or
E       conda update certifi
E   
E   ERROR: Illegal argument(s) (Last project admin cannot be removed)
